attributes.action: Transfer the founds on the war in Afghanistan to the State Pension fund
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop wasting British Lives and tax payers Money on a war that can not be won and does not make the country more secure (Some argue less secure), instead channel the funds wasted on this war into the State Pension system and help support the British Public at home where the money would be much better spent for the good of the British Public and taxpayers.
